description: Visible test case for NanoGrad Autograd Engine
note: This test case does NOT include expected outputs. Use it to understand the testing approach.

test_case.name: Basic gradient computation
test_case.description: Tests simple expression: f(x, y) = x*y + x^2
test_case.hint: Expected gradients: dz/dx = y + 2*x = 3 + 4 = 7, dz/dy = x = 2
